channel.title: Battlestar Tales: ViPs
channel.description: A Fan made machinima adventure based in the Battlestar Galactica Universe. Follow our heros through both war and emotional battles as they patrol the galaxy keeping the Last remnants of humanity safe-ish!
channel.itunes:keywords: fantasy, battlestar, galactica,fan films,horror,comics,audio drama,audio play,comedy, space
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Fan made machinima adventure based in the Battlestar Galactica Universe. Follow our heros through both war and emotional battles as they patrol the galaxy keeping the Last remnants of humanity safe-ish! Produced entirely by volunteers.
channel.itunes:summary: A Fan made machinima adventure based in the Battlestar Galactica Universe. Follow our heros through both war and emotional battles as they patrol the galaxy keeping the Last remnants of humanity safe-ish!
channel.itunes:author: Fictionshed

item.title: Episode 01: Pebbles
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 01: Pebbles

item.itunes:author: Fictionshed
